search.description: Only return messages that contains search term. Without specific message properties, the search is carried out on the default search properties of from, subject, and body. More info.
search.title: Search

receivedBefore.description: Get all messages received before the specified date. In an expression you can set date using string in ISO format or a timestamp in miliseconds.
receivedBefore.title: Received Before

sender.description: Sender name or email to filter by

receivedAfter.title: Received After

attachmentsPrefix.description: Prefix for name of the output fields to put the binary files data in. An index starting from 0 will be added. So if name is "attachment_" the first attachment is saved to "attachment_0".
